__e: You have the right to remain silent and refuse to answer any questions.

So, when the night was still and quiet, and the sound of the blood in your veins filled your ears, the only way to silence it was to slip out into the night, and like the hunter that spawned you, join in the struggle of life and death.
I told you to fasten your seat belt.
- No, I'm as quiet as the grave.
And God was silent, as one who searches the strength of a man.
You can count on me. I'll be as mute as a dolmen.
